Quest presented by: Village Elder of Elderswood. This revolves around an ominous presence termed as \'The Shadow Lord\' from an old folklore. The said Lord\'s followers (goblins) have been performing an ancient ritual to bring him back, and the villagers are being sacrificed as part of this dark ceremony, disappearing one by one as the ritual progresses. REQUEST: To put an end to this ritual. VENUE: Meet me at the townhall of Elderswood for guidance. REWARD: 2500 Ryuls, Iron Armour Set.
You, noble knight, must stop this evil before it is too late. Start your journey into the Blackthorn Forest and uncover the dark ritual that threatens us all.

You meet the Village Elder in the town hall of Elderswood. His face is grave, and the room is dimly lit by flickering torches. \'The Shadow Lord has begun his return,\' he says in a low, serious voice. \'His followers have taken our people, sacrificing them one by one.
The Elder recommends you to visit the blacksmith for refining your equipment and to grab some health potions
You have entered the Blackthorn Forest. An uncanny aura sets in. Which route will you take?
